name: EH F-List Tweaks
description:
Tweaks for f-list.net by Ersatz Haderach

Overall
• header/logo size reduced
• height restriction/forced scroll of 'Help and Info' menu removed
• global menu subheaders changed to black for emphasis (Dark Theme)

User Bookmarks Page, User Friends Page
• Changed from single item list to columns

User Notes
• Increased avatar sizes from 30px to 70px

User Icons Page
• Resized to 50px to reflect how they'll actually appear in use
• Background color changed to match default profile background color (Dark Theme)

User Inlines Page
* Scrollbar added to 'Used by' list if it overflows (instead of being hidden currently)

User Settings Page
* 'Accordion' sections height fixed

Profile Pages
• Avatar centered
• Action buttons (Report, Bookmark, Memo) aligned and hover color added
• Custom Kinks restored to 'normal' font weight for visibility
